cobblemon.species.philmon.name: Phirtunt
cobblemon.species.philmon.desc1: Appears to do simple, routine tasks wherever it lives, ranging anywhere from water plants to electrical repair.
cobblemon.species.philmon.desc2: There has only been one recorded sighting of this pokémon. Until recently, this was considered to be a joke.
cobblemon.species.philmonpreteen.name: Philank
cobblemon.species.philmonpreteen.desc1: At an awkward stage in life, Phreteen tends to train its fists against metallic objects. Who want's to fight the guy who punches metal? For fun?
cobblemon.species.philmonpreteen.desc2: There has only been one recorded sighting of this pokémon. Until recently, this was considered to be a joke.
